channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitdefender -- Bitdefender Total Security 2020
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bitdefender -- Bitdefender Total Security 2020

item.title: CVE-2020-8102|2024-08-04T09:48:25.627Z -- bitdefender -- bitdefender%20total%20security%202020
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in the Safepay browser component of Bitdefender Total Security 2020 allows an external, specially crafted web page to run remote commands inside the Safepay Utility process. This issue affects Bitdefender Total Security 2020 versions prior to 24.0.20.116.

item.title: CVE-2020-8095|2024-08-04T09:48:25.128Z -- bitdefender -- bitdefender%20total%20security%202020
item.description: A vulnerability in the improper handling of junctions before deletion in Bitdefender Total Security 2020 can allow an attacker to to trigger a denial of service on the affected device.
